snippet.title: Chronicles of Teddy - Harmony Of Exidus trailer
snippet.description:
Finding Teddy Harmony Of Exidus ( Finding Teddy 2 DEFINITIVE EDITION ) on PC, MAC ( free update ), WiiU and PS4.

DEFINITIVE EDITION IMPROVEMENTS

New features and adjustments ( increase graphics, level design, mini map, new game + ... )


Chronicles of Teddy is a 2D Adventure / Action game with a Pixel Art Retro finish. 
Help Tarrant in a quest, in which you will have to fight, use your sense of direction and hearing to accomplish your mission.
Very long playing time, over 20 hours for the main quest. Dozens of hours for the secondary quests!
Beautiful Pixel Art Finish that takes us back to the 8-16 bit era, with modern effects.
Unique use of music with the Musicom.
A high level challenge and difficulty that all Gamers will love.
An Action / Adventure type game which is all too rare nowadays.
